description:
Light enough for the road and burly enough for the trail, these running shoes can go seamlessly from pavement to gravel. The sticky rubber compound on the sole grips the street, and aggressive lugs dig into the dirt when it's time to go offroad. The knit upper keeps your feet from overheating and has an antimicrobial treatment to resist foot funk after hours of intense running.

  • Lightweight knit upper is highly breathable to keep feet cool and comfortable
  • Powerflow+ EVA midsole absorbs the shocks of the trail
  • BOOMERANG insole adds extra cushion and rebound to your shoes when pounding the pavement or getting miles in on the trail
  • Dynamic Fascia Band™ (DFB) shank delivers a kick of energy with each step
  • Antimicrobial treatment keeps them smelling fresh
  • Sticky rubber outsole with aggressive 4mm lugs provide traction on loose trails
name: Inov-8 Parkclaw 260 Knit Trail Running Shoes - Women's
